4: An auxiliary adjective used to indicate that the state described by the preceding words cannot be reached.
An auxiliary adjective used to indicate that the action or state described by the preceding words is too extreme to be sustained.

1: 어떤 대상이 앞말이 뜻하는 행동을 할 타당한 이유를 가질 정도로 가치가 있음을 나타내는 말.
앞말이 뜻하는 행동을 하는 것이 가능함을 나타내는 말.

0: An auxiliary adjective used to indicate that the action described by the preceding words is worth doing.
An auxiliary adjective used to indicate that one can do the action described by the preceding words.
